attributes.action: Give the names of Robert Thompson and Jon Venables.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time the people of this country knew the real identities of these two...How many other peoples lives are going to be put through hell being wrongly accused, whilst these 2 are able to get off lightly?   They are adults now, and it's about time they stopped receiving special treatment.

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
